trans-unit.source: Attended Knight
trans-unit.target: 扈伴骑士

trans-unit.resname: MM3·1 | Attended Knight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: The virtues of knighthood are best taught in the field.
trans-unit.target: 骑士美德在实战中才能感同身受。

trans-unit.source: Banishing Stroke
trans-unit.target: 驱逐一击

trans-unit.resname: MM3·2 | Banishing Stroke | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put target artifact, creature, or enchantment on the bottom of its owner's library.\nMiracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器，生物或结界置于其拥有者的牌库底。 奇迹{W}（当你抓此牌时，如果它是你于本回合抓的第一张牌，你可以支付其奇迹费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.source: Blade Splicer
trans-unit.target: 锋刃接合师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·3 | Blade Splicer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.\nGolem creatures you control have first strike.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。 由你操控的魔像生物具有先攻异能。

trans-unit.source: "Flesh is a betrayal of the self."
trans-unit.target: 「肉体是对自我的背叛。」

trans-unit.resname: MM3·4 | Entreat the Angels | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Entreat the Angels
trans-unit.target: 敦请天使

trans-unit.resname: MM3·4 | Entreat the Angels | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create X 4/4 white Angel creature tokens with flying.\nMiracle {X}{W}{W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 派出X个4/4白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物。 奇迹{X}{W}{W}（当你抓此牌时，如果它是你于本回合抓的第一张牌，你可以支付其奇迹费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.resname: MM3·5 | Eyes in the Skies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Eyes in the Skies
trans-unit.target: 苍穹之眼

trans-unit.resname: MM3·5 | Eyes in the Skies | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying, then populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物，然后殖民。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: MM3·5 | Eyes in the Skies | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "What root and branch cannot reach, our winged friends will attend to."\n—Zunak, Selesnya strategist
trans-unit.target: 「根须和枝杈无法触及之处，长翅膀的朋友会替我们照看。」 ～瑟雷尼亚战术家祖奈

trans-unit.source: Flickerwisp
trans-unit.target: 明灭翔灵

trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, exile another target permanent. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，放逐另一个目标永久物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将所放逐的牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Its wings disturb more than air.
trans-unit.target: 其翅翼比所卷起的气流更扰乱人心。

trans-unit.source: Gideon's Lawkeeper
trans-unit.target: 基定维安兵

trans-unit.resname: MM3·7 | Gideon's Lawkeeper | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {W}, {T}: Tap target creature.
trans-unit.target: {W}，{T}：横置目标生物。

trans-unit.source: "The essence of a lawful society is swift deterrence."
trans-unit.target: 「法治社会的精髓就是迅速吓阻。」

trans-unit.source: Graceful Reprieve
trans-unit.target: 优雅免难

trans-unit.resname: MM3·8 | Graceful Reprieve | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When target creature dies this turn, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control.
trans-unit.target: 本回合中，当目标生物死去时，将该牌在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: "In my moment of death, I had a vision of the world, dark and unwelcoming. I wanted to hide in the deepest meander, but the light pulled me back."
trans-unit.target: 「在濒死瞬间，我看到来世的景象；一片漆黑，不怀好意。我想在暗境中藏身，却被那道光拉了回来。」

trans-unit.source: Intangible Virtue
trans-unit.target: 无形美善

trans-unit.resname: MM3·9 | Intangible Virtue | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creature tokens you control get +1/+1 and have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的衍生生物得+1/+1且具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: In life, they were a motley crew: farmers, lords, cutpurses, priests. In death, they are united in singular, benevolent purpose.
trans-unit.target: 他们生时是各式各样的成员：农夫，地主，扒手，僧侣。他们死后则结合成单一的仁爱趋力。

trans-unit.source: Kor Hookmaster
trans-unit.target: 寇族使钩大师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·10 | Kor Hookmaster | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，横置目标由对手操控的生物。该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: "For us, a rope represents the ties that bind the kor. For you, it's more literal."
trans-unit.target: 「对我们来说，绳索代表着将寇族联系一体的羁绊。对你来说，这更加具体。」

trans-unit.source: Kor Skyfisher
trans-unit.target: 寇族空渔人

trans-unit.resname: MM3·11 | Kor Skyfisher | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return a permanent you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将一个由你操控的永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "Sometimes I snare the unexpected, but I know its purpose will be revealed in time."
trans-unit.target: 「有时我会意外抓到别的东西，但我知道其缘由终将揭晓。」

trans-unit.source: Lingering Souls
trans-unit.target: 徘徊灵魂

trans-unit.resname: MM3·12 | Lingering Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying.\nFlashback {1}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 派出两个1/1白色，具飞行异能的精怪衍生生物。 返照{1}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: The murdered inhabitants of Hollowhenge impart to the living the terror they felt in death.
trans-unit.target: 空圆地遇难者将自己死时的恐惧传给生者。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·13 | Linvala, Keeper of Silence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Linvala, Keeper of Silence
trans-unit.target: 寂静守卫琳法拉

trans-unit.resname: MM3·13 | Linvala, Keeper of Silence | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nActivated abilities of creatures your opponents control can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 由对手操控的生物之起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·13 | Linvala, Keeper of Silence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who seek to disturb the harmony of life will see their instruments taken from them.
trans-unit.target: 干扰生命乐章者，将发现自己无器材可加入合奏。

trans-unit.source: Lone Missionary
trans-unit.target: 独行传教士

trans-unit.resname: MM3·14 | Lone Missionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: His mission has become a grim pilgrimage, a tour of the Eldrazi-stricken outposts across Zendikar. But he marches on alone, stubborn as the daily dawn.
trans-unit.target: 他的任务已成为灰暗的朝圣路途，在赞迪卡各处遭奥札奇袭击的哨站之间前进。但他依旧独身前行，一如每日坚持升起的朝阳。

trans-unit.source: Master Splicer
trans-unit.target: 接合大师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·15 | Master Splicer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.\nGolem creatures you control get +1/+1.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。 由你操控的魔像生物得+1/+1。

trans-unit.source: With Phyrexia's victory at hand, each sect began perfecting its vision.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚的胜利已在眼前，旗下每个分部已开始整顿基础。

trans-unit.source: Momentary Blink
trans-unit.target: 瞬时闪动

trans-unit.resname: MM3·16 | Momentary Blink | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature you control, then return it to the battlefield under its owner's control.\nFlashback {3}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标由你操控的生物，然后将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。 返照{3}{U}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.resname: MM3·17 | Path to Exile | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Path to Exile
trans-unit.target: 流放之径

trans-unit.resname: MM3·17 | Path to Exile | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile target creature. Its controller may search his or her library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 放逐目标生物。其操控者可以从其牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将该牌横置放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Pitfall Trap
trans-unit.target: 坠穴陷阱

trans-unit.resname: MM3·18 | Pitfall Trap | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: If exactly one creature is attacking, you may pay {W} rather than pay CARDNAME's mana cost.\nDestroy target attacking creature without flying.
trans-unit.target: 如果正好一个生物进行攻击，你可以支付{W}，而不支付CARDNAME的法术力费用。 消灭目标进行攻击且不具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: Each spike is poisoned—the trapmaker's idea of mercy.
trans-unit.target: 每根刺都涂了毒～这是设陷人所谓的慈悲。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·19 | Ranger of Eos | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ranger of Eos
trans-unit.target: 亿欧护林兵

trans-unit.resname: MM3·19 | Ranger of Eos | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for up to two creature cards with converted mana cost 1 or less, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻至多两张生物牌，且每张牌的总法术力费用均须等于或小于1，展示这些牌，并将它们置于你手上。若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·19 | Ranger of Eos | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: At his side, humble beasts become weapons more deadly than sharpened steel.
trans-unit.target: 生性温和的动物为他战斗时，也能成为比利剑更强大的武器。

trans-unit.source: Restoration Angel
trans-unit.target: 复归天使

trans-unit.resname: MM3·20 | Restoration Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile target non-Angel creature you control, then return that card to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以放逐目标由你操控且非天使的生物，然后将该牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Rootborn Defenses
trans-unit.target: 根生卫护

trans-unit.resname: MM3·21 | Rootborn Defenses | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Populate. Creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. (To populate, create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 殖民。由你操控的生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。（殖民的流程是派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.source: Séance
trans-unit.target: 降灵

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each upkeep, you may exile target creature card from your graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of that card, except it's a Spirit in addition to its other types. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 在每个维持开始时，你可以将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场放逐。若你如此作，则派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该牌的复制品，但额外具有精怪此类别。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Sensor Splicer
trans-unit.target: 感应接合师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·23 | Sensor Splicer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.\nGolem creatures you control have vigilance.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。 由你操控的魔像生物具有警戒异能。

trans-unit.source: With clarity of vision comes clarity of function.
trans-unit.target: 视像清晰，功能明确。

trans-unit.source: Soul Warden
trans-unit.target: 护灵师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·24 | Soul Warden | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物进战场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."
trans-unit.target: 「没人会在乎砂漏中的砂粒是怎样的大小与形状。我也不会在乎该我管教的人脾气是怎么样。」

trans-unit.source: Stony Silence
trans-unit.target: 沉重静寂

trans-unit.resname: MM3·25 | Stony Silence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of artifacts can't be activated.
trans-unit.target: 神器的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.source: The relic's purpose? Its design? Whatever the intent, it is now a mere curiosity that breaks up the horizon.
trans-unit.target: 这尊残像曾有何用途？为何会是这副模样？不管它原本为何而建，如今只不过是天边的一处奇景而已。

trans-unit.source: Terminus
trans-unit.target: 终始

trans-unit.source: Put all creatures on the bottom of their owners' libraries.\nMiracle {W} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 将所有生物分别置于其拥有者的牌库底。 奇迹{W}（当你抓此牌时，如果它是你于本回合抓的第一张牌，你可以支付其奇迹费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.source: Urbis Protector
trans-unit.target: 城市守护人

trans-unit.resname: MM3·27 | Urbis Protector | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个4/4白色，具飞行异能的天使衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: "Guilds be damned. We can fend for ourselves."\n—Vennick of the Gateless
trans-unit.target: 「公会该亡。我们能保护自己。」 ～无属者凡尼克

trans-unit.resname: MM3·28 | Wake the Reflections | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wake the Reflections
trans-unit.target: 映像觉醒

trans-unit.resname: MM3·28 | Wake the Reflections | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Populate. (Create a token that's a copy of a creature token you control.)
trans-unit.target: 殖民。（派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为由你操控的某衍生生物之复制品。）

trans-unit.resname: MM3·28 | Wake the Reflections | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You see a bird, an oak, a packbeast. I see the potential for an army."\n—Lalia, Selesnya dryad
trans-unit.target: 「你看到的是一只鸟、一株橡树、一匹驮兽。我看到的则是成为一支军队的潜力。」 ～瑟雷尼亚树灵拉黎亚

trans-unit.source: Youthful Knight
trans-unit.target: 青年骑士

trans-unit.resname: MM3·29 | Youthful Knight | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: First strike
trans-unit.target: 先攻

trans-unit.source: "Let no child be without a sword. We will all fight, for if we fail, we will certainly all die."\n—Oracle *en*-Vec
trans-unit.target: 「别让孩子们荒废了武艺。我们将群起奋战，因为那必是攸关生死存亡的一役。」 ～维克族神谕使

trans-unit.resname: MM3·30 | Augur of Bolas | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Augur of Bolas
trans-unit.target: 波拉斯卜算师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·30 | Augur of Bolas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an instant or sorcery card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的三张牌。你可以展示其中的一张瞬间或法术牌，并将它置于你手上。将其余的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Azure Mage
trans-unit.target: 碧蓝法师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·31 | Azure Mage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}{U}: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {3}{U}：抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "We draw our power from the infinite ocean of the mind, where all manner of things can be conceived."\n—Azure creed
trans-unit.target: 「我们自心灵的无垠大海获取力量，万物秩序均构想自该处。」 ～碧蓝信条

trans-unit.source: Cackling Counterpart
trans-unit.target: 咳笑复身

trans-unit.resname: MM3·32 | Cackling Counterpart | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.\nFlashback {5}{U}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为目标由你操控的生物之复制品。 返照{5}{U}{U}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Compulsive Research
trans-unit.target: 强制探寻

trans-unit.resname: MM3·33 | Compulsive Research | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player draws three cards. Then that player discards two cards unless he or she discards a land card.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓三张牌。然后除非该牌手弃一张地牌，否则他弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Four parts molten bronze, yes . . . one part frozen mercury, yes, yes . . . but then what?"
trans-unit.target: 「四份融解青铜，有了...一份冰冻水银，有了，有了...还需要什么？」

trans-unit.source: Crippling Chill
trans-unit.target: 致残冰寒

trans-unit.resname: MM3·34 | Crippling Chill | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物。它于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: One breath of the geist turns veins to rivers of ice and freezes hearts midbeat.
trans-unit.target: 游魂吹一口气，能使血管结为冰河，心跳旋即冻结。

trans-unit.source: Cyclonic Rift
trans-unit.target: 龙卷裂空

trans-unit.resname: MM3·35 | Cyclonic Rift | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent you don't control to its owner's hand.\nOverload {6}{U} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")
trans-unit.target: 将目标不由你操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。 超载{6}{U}（你可以支付此咒语的超载费用来施放它。如果你如此作，将其中的「目标」字样全部更改为「每个」。）

trans-unit.source: The Izzet specialize in unnatural disaster.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷以非天然灾害为业。

trans-unit.source: Deadeye Navigator
trans-unit.target: 神准导灵

trans-unit.resname: MM3·36 | Deadeye Navigator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "{1}{U}: Exile this creature, then return it to the battlefield under your control."
trans-unit.target: 魂系（你可以将此生物与另一未搭档的生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。于你同时操控这两者的时段内，它们持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，它们便各具有「{1}{U}：放逐此生物，然后将它在你的操控下移回战场。」

trans-unit.source: Familiar's Ruse
trans-unit.target: 佣兽诈术

trans-unit.resname: MM3·37 | Familiar's Ruse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.\nCounter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 将一个由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: Because of their capricious nature, faeries can serve as living lenses for disruptive magic.
trans-unit.target: 仙灵天性善变，正好可当干扰法术的生体透镜。

trans-unit.source: Forbidden Alchemy
trans-unit.target: 炼金禁术

trans-unit.resname: MM3·38 | Forbidden Alchemy | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.\nFlashback {6}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余则置入你的坟墓场。 返照{6}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Ghostly Flicker
trans-unit.target: 鬼影闪烁

trans-unit.resname: MM3·39 | Ghostly Flicker | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Exile two target artifacts, creatures, and/or lands you control, then return those cards to the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 放逐两个由你操控的目标神器，生物和／或地，然后将这些牌在你的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes it's useful to take a break from existence.
trans-unit.target: 有时暂且消失也不错。

trans-unit.source: Gifts Ungiven
trans-unit.target: 未送出的礼物

trans-unit.resname: MM3·40 | Gifts Ungiven | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Search your library for up to four cards with different names and reveal them. Target opponent chooses two of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your graveyard and the rest into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻至多四张名称各不相同的牌并展示之。目标对手选择其中两张牌。将所选的牌置入你的坟墓场，其余则置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·41 | Grasp of Phantoms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grasp of Phantoms
trans-unit.target: 幽灵之攫

trans-unit.resname: MM3·41 | Grasp of Phantoms | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.\nFlashback {7}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物置于其拥有者的牌库顶。 返照{7}{U}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Kraken Hatchling
trans-unit.target: 巨海兽幼雏

trans-unit.source: A spike and a maul are needed to crack their shells, but the taste is worth the effort.
trans-unit.target: 用钉子与锤头才能打开外壳，但其滋味值得花上这番工夫。

trans-unit.source: Mist Raven
trans-unit.target: 雾鸦

trans-unit.resname: MM3·43 | Mist Raven | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: "When you see a raven, head for the hills. It knows when the ghost-tide is headed in."\n—Sved, fisherman of Nephalia
trans-unit.target: 「若看到乌鸦，快逃往山丘。鬼潮一涌入，他们马上就知道。」 ～涅非利亚渔夫思韦

trans-unit.source: Mystical Teachings
trans-unit.target: 神秘教谕

trans-unit.resname: MM3·44 | Mystical Teachings | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Search your library for an instant card or a card with flash, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.\nFlashback {5}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张瞬间牌或具闪现异能的牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。然后将你的牌库洗牌。 返照{5}{B}（你可以从你的坟墓场施放此牌，并支付其返照费用。然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Opportunity
trans-unit.target: 机遇

trans-unit.source: Target player draws four cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手抓四张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Opportunity isn't something you wait for. It's something you create."
trans-unit.target: 「机遇不是等来的，而是创造出来的。」

trans-unit.source: Phantasmal Image
trans-unit.target: 幻象身影

trans-unit.resname: MM3·46 | Phantasmal Image | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it's an Illusion in addition to its other types and it gains "When this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它额外具有虚影此类别，且获得「当此生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。」

trans-unit.source: Rewind
trans-unit.target: 倒退

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。重置至多四个地。

trans-unit.source: "The best denials are simply that: a beginning and end unchanged, a dream with no memory."
trans-unit.target: 「最出色的否定就像这样：开始与结束没有任何变化，一如没留下记忆的梦。」

trans-unit.resname: MM3·48 | Sea Gate Oracle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sea Gate Oracle
trans-unit.target: 海户先知

trans-unit.resname: MM3·48 | Sea Gate Oracle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·48 | Sea Gate Oracle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The secret entrance should be near."
trans-unit.target: 「秘密入口应该就在附近。」

trans-unit.source: Serum Visions
trans-unit.target: 浆液预视

trans-unit.resname: MM3·49 | Serum Visions | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw a card. Scry 2.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。占卜2。

trans-unit.source: Serum was once derived from Mirrodin's blinkmoths, offering visions of inspiration. Now it is pulled from Phyrexian inkmoths, yielding visions of perfection.
trans-unit.target: 原本采自秘罗地光蛾的浆液，可让饮者眼中见得启悟。如今浆液萃自非瑞克西亚墨蛾，能令受者眼中得见完美。

trans-unit.source: Snapcaster Mage
trans-unit.target: 迅咒法师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·50 | Snapcaster Mage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. (You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标在你坟墓场中的瞬间或法术牌获得返照异能直到回合结束。其返照费用等同于该牌的法术力费用。（你可以从你的坟墓场施放该牌，并支付其返照费用，然后将它放逐。）

trans-unit.source: Spell Pierce
trans-unit.target: 点破咒语

trans-unit.resname: MM3·51 | Spell Pierce | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
trans-unit.target: 除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。

trans-unit.source: "There's a hole in your plan."\n—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage
trans-unit.target: 「你的计划有漏洞。」 ～塔晋息法师诺言达

trans-unit.source: Spire Monitor
trans-unit.target: 尖塔监卫

trans-unit.resname: MM3·52 | Spire Monitor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nFlying
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。） 飞行

trans-unit.source: Each monitor is given an eye for each spire it is to guard.
trans-unit.target: 监卫要负责看守几个塔，就会获取几个眼睛。

trans-unit.source: Tandem Lookout
trans-unit.target: 协力警戒员

trans-unit.resname: MM3·53 | Tandem Lookout | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is paired with another creature, each of those creatures has "Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, draw a card."
trans-unit.target: 魂系（你可以将此生物与另一未搭档的生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。于你同时操控这两者的时段内，它们持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，它们便各具有「每当此生物向任一对手造成伤害时，抓一张牌。」

trans-unit.source: Temporal Mastery
trans-unit.target: 精研时序

trans-unit.resname: MM3·54 | Temporal Mastery | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Take an extra turn after this one. Exile CARDNAME.\nMiracle {1}{U} (You may cast this card for its miracle cost when you draw it if it's the first card you drew this turn.)
trans-unit.target: 于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。放逐CARDNAME。 奇迹{1}{U}（当你抓此牌时，如果它是你于本回合抓的第一张牌，你可以支付其奇迹费用来施放它。）

trans-unit.source: Time is a marvelous plaything.
trans-unit.target: 时间是令人惊叹的玩物。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·55 | Venser, Shaper Savant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Venser, Shaper Savant
trans-unit.target: 塑形学者凡瑟

trans-unit.resname: MM3·55 | Venser, Shaper Savant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target spell or permanent to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标咒语或永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·55 | Venser, Shaper Savant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His marvels of artifice pale in comparison to the developing machinery of his mind.
trans-unit.target: 他的神器手艺高超，但还远不及头脑中持续发展壮大的机械蓝图。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·56 | Wall of Frost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wall of Frost
trans-unit.target: 霜墙

trans-unit.resname: MM3·56 | Wall of Frost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\nWhenever CARDNAME blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 守军 每当CARDNAME阻挡一个生物时，该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·56 | Wall of Frost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."\n—Lumi, goatherd
trans-unit.target: 「它来得好。牧野没了杂草，狼也给冻成冰块。」 ～山羊牧人卢美

trans-unit.source: Wing Splicer
trans-unit.target: 飞翼接合师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·57 | Wing Splicer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.\nGolem creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个3/3无色魔像衍生神器生物。 由你操控的魔像生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "Progress is our great inheritance, perfection our ultimate destination."
trans-unit.target: 「进展是我们的伟大传承，完美是我们的最终归宿。」

trans-unit.source: Wingcrafter
trans-unit.target: 飞翼匠

trans-unit.source: Soulbond (You may pair this creature with another unpaired creature when either enters the battlefield. They remain paired for as long as you control both of them.)\nAs long as CARDNAME is paired with another creature, both creatures have flying.
trans-unit.target: 魂系（你可以将此生物与另一未搭档的生物在它们任一进战场时组搭档。于你同时操控这两者的时段内，它们持续搭档。） 只要CARDNAME与另一生物搭档，此二者便具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Abyssal Specter
trans-unit.target: 深渊幽灵

trans-unit.resname: MM3·59 | Abyssal Specter | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成伤害时，该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: It rides to a chorus of whispers that are more felt than heard.
trans-unit.target: 幽音韵集载其翱翔，虽无声，更震撼。

trans-unit.source: Bone Splinters
trans-unit.target: 碎骨贯身

trans-unit.resname: MM3·60 | Bone Splinters | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast CARDNAME, sacrifice a creature.\nDestroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放CARDNAME的额外费用。 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.source: Witches of the Split-Eye Coven speak of a future when Grixis will overflow with life energy. For now, they must harvest vis from the living to fuel their dark magics.
trans-unit.target: 在共眼集巫师谈述的未来中，格利极将会充满生命能量。而目前来说，他们得从活物采收生命来当作黑暗法术的能量。

trans-unit.source: Corpse Connoisseur
trans-unit.target: 死尸鉴赏家

trans-unit.resname: MM3·61 | Corpse Connoisseur | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a creature card and put that card into your graveyard. If you do, shuffle your library.\nUnearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将该牌置入你的坟墓场。若你如此作，则将你的牌库洗牌。 破坟{3}{B}（{3}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: MM3·62 | Cower in Fear | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cower in Fear
trans-unit.target: 恐惧畏缩

trans-unit.resname: MM3·62 | Cower in Fear | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures your opponents control get -1/-1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 由对手操控的生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·62 | Cower in Fear | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You will fully understand fear when you discover it is the final thing you put your faith in."\n—Nicol Bolas
trans-unit.target: 「等你发现恐惧是你最后能够相信的东西，就会彻底懂得它。」 ～尼可波拉斯

trans-unit.source: Damnation
trans-unit.target: 破灭

trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。它们不能重生。

trans-unit.source: Death's Shadow
trans-unit.target: 死亡阴影

trans-unit.resname: MM3·64 | Death's Shadow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME gets -X/-X, where X is your life total.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME得-X/-X，X为你的总生命。

trans-unit.source: The shadow of the candle looms tall even as its light grows dim.
trans-unit.target: 蜡烛火光渐弱，而其阴影愈显高大。

trans-unit.source: Delirium Skeins
trans-unit.target: 错乱术缕

trans-unit.resname: MM3·65 | Delirium Skeins | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player discards three cards.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手各弃三张牌。

trans-unit.source: There came a rush, a sudden fire in the mind. Then the two saw only the sooty fog of madness, heard only the crackling of their last thoughts burning away.
trans-unit.target: 心灵突然涌现火热思绪。之后这两人眼底仅剩疯狂的熏污漫烟，耳中仅存最后思绪焚毁的爆裂声响。

trans-unit.source: Desecration Demon
trans-unit.target: 渎圣恶魔

trans-unit.resname: MM3·66 | Desecration Demon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of each combat, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap CARDNAME and put a +1/+1 counter on it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在每次战斗开始时，任意对手可以牺牲一个生物。若有牌手如此作，则横置CARDNAME且在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Dregscape Zombie
trans-unit.target: 渣境灵俑

trans-unit.resname: MM3·67 | Dregscape Zombie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Unearth {B} ({B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 破坟{B}（{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: The undead of Grixis are fueled by their hatred of the living.
trans-unit.target: 格利极的不死生物以对生者的恨意为养分。

trans-unit.source: Entomber Exarch
trans-unit.target: 入土督教

trans-unit.resname: MM3·68 | Entomber Exarch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose one —\n• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.\n• Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature card from it. That player discards that card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择一项～ •将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 •目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张非生物牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。

trans-unit.source: Extractor Demon
trans-unit.target: 榨取恶魔

trans-unit.resname: MM3·69 | Extractor Demon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever another creature leaves the battlefield, you may have target player put the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.\nUnearth {2}{B} ({2}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当另一个生物离开战场时，你可以令目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。 破坟{2}{B}（{2}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Falkenrath Noble
trans-unit.target: 伐肯纳贵族

trans-unit.resname: MM3·70 | Falkenrath Noble | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME or another creature dies, target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME或另一个生物死去时，目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "I often think on how excited they must feel to be chosen as my prey."
trans-unit.target: 「我经常在想，被选为我的猎物者会感到多么刺激。」

trans-unit.source: Gnawing Zombie
trans-unit.target: 啃食灵俑

trans-unit.resname: MM3·71 | Gnawing Zombie | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，牺牲一个生物：目标牌手失去1点生命且你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: On still nights you can hear its rotted teeth grinding tirelessly on scavenged bones.
trans-unit.target: 在寂静的夜晚，你能听到它腐烂的牙齿不知疲倦地磨着捡来的骨头。

trans-unit.source: Griselbrand
trans-unit.target: 棘泽边

trans-unit.source: Flying, lifelink\nPay 7 life: Draw seven cards.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，系命 支付7点生命：抓七张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Avacyn emerged from the broken Helvault, but her freedom came at a price—him."\n—Thalia, Knight-Cathar
trans-unit.target: 「艾维欣自碎裂的狱窖重现，但其自由付出了高昂代价～也就是他。」 ～护教军骑士莎利雅

trans-unit.source: Grisly Spectacle
trans-unit.target: 恐怖景象

trans-unit.resname: MM3·73 | Grisly Spectacle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonartifact creature. Its controller puts a number of cards equal to that creature's power from the top of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非神器的生物。其操控者将其牌库顶若干牌置入其坟墓场，其数量等同于该生物的力量。

trans-unit.source: Grixis Slavedriver
trans-unit.target: 格利极奴工头

trans-unit.resname: MM3·74 | Grixis Slavedriver | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.\nUnearth {3}{B} ({3}{B}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离开战场时，派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。 破坟{3}{B}（{3}{B}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: MM3·75 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Inquisition of Kozilek
trans-unit.target: 寇基雷的审讯

trans-unit.resname: MM3·75 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player reveals his or her hand. You choose a nonland card from it with converted mana cost 3 or less. That player discards that card.

trans-unit.resname: MM3·75 | Inquisition of Kozilek | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: After the awakening of the Eldrazi, some vampires took it upon themselves to remind the others where their loyalty should lie.
trans-unit.target: 在奥札奇觉醒之后，一些吸血鬼主动去提醒其他吸血鬼该忠于哪一方。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·76 | Liliana of the Veil | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 面纱的莉莲娜

trans-unit.resname: MM3·76 | Liliana of the Veil | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Each player discards a card.\n−2: Target player sacrifices a creature.\n−6: Separate all permanents target player controls into two piles. That player sacrifices all permanents in the pile of his or her choice.
trans-unit.target: +1：每位牌手各弃一张牌。 −2：目标牌手牺牲一个生物。 −6：将由目标牌手操控的所有永久物分成两堆。该牌手选择其中一堆，并牺牲该堆永久物。

trans-unit.source: Mind Shatter
trans-unit.target: 粉碎心灵

trans-unit.source: Target player discards X cards at random.

trans-unit.source: Dark thoughts hatch and twist within the mind, straining to take wing.
trans-unit.target: 黑暗思绪在心灵中成形、扭曲，用尽力气想飞出来。

trans-unit.source: To the soldier, war is famine; to the scavenger, a feast.
trans-unit.target: 对士兵来说，战争是场饥荒；对清理者来说，则是场盛宴。

trans-unit.source: Night Terrors
trans-unit.target: 夜惧术

trans-unit.source: Innistrad is a place where dreams invade the mind and mere shadows exact a terrible toll.
trans-unit.target: 依尼翠此地的眠梦会入侵心灵，就连阴影都唤来恐惧。

trans-unit.target: 逃狱食人魔

trans-unit.source: It took three years for it to occur to him to use the chain as a weapon, but once it did, he made up for lost time.
trans-unit.target: 他花了三年的时间才让链子成为武器，而最终来说这一切是值得的。

trans-unit.source: "The undead are not 'awakened.' They are evicted when there is no room left in the pit for more bodies."
trans-unit.target: 「不死生物并非给『唤醒』。它们是因暗渊挤不下新尸体而被赶出来的。」

trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Wisdom from the past is best gathered directly from the source."

trans-unit.resname: MM3·83 | Seal of Doom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A basilisk's gaze is effective, but disposing of physical remains is a tiresome task. It's far more discreet to dissolve one's victim entirely."\n—Szadek
trans-unit.target: 「蜥怪的逼视虽然有效，但处理残留物质却很费工夫。这远比不上将受害者完全分解。」 ～札戴克

trans-unit.target: 派出一个5/5绿色，具践踏异能的亚龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·147 | Advent of the Wurm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The consciousness of Mat'Selesnya does not always spread in peaceful ways.
trans-unit.target: 太瑟雷尼亚的意识也有狂暴之时。

trans-unit.source: Aethermage's Touch
trans-unit.target: 乙太法师之触

trans-unit.resname: MM3·148 | Aethermage's Touch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a creature card from among them onto the battlefield. It gains "At the beginning of your end step, return this creature to its owner's hand." Then put the rest of the cards revealed this way on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的四张牌。你可以将其中一张生物牌放进战场。它获得「在你的结束步骤开始时，将此生物移回其拥有者手上。」然后将以此法展示的其他牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·149 | Agent of Masks | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Agent of Masks
trans-unit.target: 假面密探

trans-unit.resname: MM3·149 | Agent of Masks | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 1 life. You gain life equal to the life lost this way.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位对手各失去1点生命。你获得若干生命，其数量等同于以此法失去的生命总和。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·149 | Agent of Masks | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Two-faced" is an understatement.
trans-unit.target: 「双面人」是一种保守的说法。

trans-unit.source: Agony Warp
trans-unit.target: 苦痛歪曲

trans-unit.resname: MM3·150 | Agony Warp | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.\nTarget creature gets -0/-3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-3/-0直到回合结束。 目标生物得-0/-3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Life's circle has become inverted in Grixis. The same energy is endlessly recycled and becomes more stagnant with each pass.
trans-unit.target: 生命的循环在格利极逆转。同样的能量无止境地循环利用，每一轮过后都变得更加腐臭。

trans-unit.source: Auger Spree
trans-unit.target: 钻法无歇

trans-unit.resname: MM3·151 | Auger Spree | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +4/-4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+4/-4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Finally, a weapon the Boros can't confiscate!"\n—Juri, proprietor of the Juri Revue
trans-unit.target: 「终于有柄波洛斯无法没收的武器！」 ～裘里剧团业主裘里

trans-unit.source: Bronzebeak Moa
trans-unit.target: 铜喙恐鸟

trans-unit.resname: MM3·152 | Bronzebeak Moa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield under your control, CARDNAME gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个生物在你的操控下进战场时，CARDNAME得+3/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: They fight for their home with more loyalty than any conscript.
trans-unit.target: 它们是为家园奋战，要比任何征来的兵更卖力。

trans-unit.source: Broodmate Dragon
trans-unit.target: 幼伴巨龙

trans-unit.resname: MM3·153 | Broodmate Dragon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个4/4红色，具飞行异能的龙衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Frozen in fear, the goblins stared upward at the circling hunter—and were promptly eaten by its diving mate.
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪抬头望着头顶盘旋的猎者，身体因恐惧而僵直～然后就给它俯冲而下的伙伴吃掉。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·154 | Call of the Conclave | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Call of the Conclave
trans-unit.target: 盟会的呼唤

trans-unit.resname: MM3·154 | Call of the Conclave | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Create a 3/3 green Centaur creature token.
trans-unit.target: 派出一个3/3绿色半人马衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·154 | Call of the Conclave | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Centaurs are sent to evangelize in Gruul territories where words of war speak louder than prayers of peace.
trans-unit.target: 半人马被派往古鲁领地传福音，该处战争的号令压过和平的祷词。

trans-unit.source: Carnage Gladiator
trans-unit.target: 屠戮角斗士

trans-unit.resname: MM3·155 | Carnage Gladiator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature blocks, that creature's controller loses 1 life.\n{1}{B}{R}: Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个生物阻挡时，该生物的操控者失去1点生命。 {1}{B}{R}：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Not the foulest or bloodiest act at Rix Maadi by a stretch.
trans-unit.target: 这谈不上是锐兹玛第发生过最残忍、血腥的事件。

trans-unit.source: Centaur Healer
trans-unit.target: 半人马治疗师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·156 | Centaur Healer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: Instructors at the Kasarna training grounds are capable healers in case their students fail to grasp the subtleties of combat.
trans-unit.target: 卡沙拿训练场的指导者都是能干的治疗师，以防他们的学生无法拿捏分寸。

trans-unit.source: Coiling Oracle
trans-unit.target: 盘卷先知

trans-unit.resname: MM3·157 | Coiling Oracle | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put that card into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，展示你的牌库顶牌。若该牌是地牌，则将之放进战场。若否，则将该牌置于你手上。

trans-unit.source: Snaking remnants of nature directed by a body of thought and progress, the oracles embody all that is Simic.
trans-unit.target: 可思考与创造的身体引导着阴险的自然残存者；此先知正是析米克的具现。

trans-unit.source: Cruel Ultimatum
trans-unit.target: 残酷通牒

trans-unit.resname: MM3·158 | Cruel Ultimatum | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target opponent sacrifices a creature, discards three cards, then loses 5 life. You return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, draw three cards, then gain 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标对手牺牲一个生物，弃三张牌，然后失去5点生命。你将一张生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上，抓三张牌，然后获得5点生命。

trans-unit.source: There is always a greater power.
trans-unit.target: 强中还有强中手。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·159 | Deputy of Acquittals | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deputy of Acquittals
trans-unit.target: 开释代行官

trans-unit.resname: MM3·159 | Deputy of Acquittals | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may return another target creature you control to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 闪现（你可以于你能够施放瞬间的时机下施放此咒语。） 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以将另一个目标由你操控的生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·159 | Deputy of Acquittals | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Everyone deserves a day in court."
trans-unit.target: 「每个人迟早都该上法庭。」

trans-unit.source: Dinrova Horror
trans-unit.target: 汀洛瓦惊惧兽

trans-unit.resname: MM3·160 | Dinrova Horror | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, return target permanent to its owner's hand, then that player discards a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，将目标永久物移回其拥有者手上，然后该牌手弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "Welcome to the Dimir Public Offices. Not responsible for death or loss of property. Basement off-limits."\n—Sign outside Dinrova Building
trans-unit.target: 「欢迎来到底密尔公共部门。死亡或财物损失概不负责。地下室禁止进入。」 ～汀洛瓦建筑物外的告示

trans-unit.source: Domri Rade
trans-unit.target: 多密雷德

trans-unit.resname: MM3·161 | Domri Rade | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.\n−2: Target creature you control fights another target creature.\n−7: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have double strike, trample, hexproof, and haste."
trans-unit.target: +1：检视你的牌库顶牌。如果该牌是生物牌，你可以展示该牌并置于你手上。 −2:：目标由你操控的生物与另一个目标生物互斗。 −7：你获得具有「由你操控的生物具有连击，践踏，辟邪与敏捷异能」的徽记。

trans-unit.source: Evil Twin
trans-unit.target: 邪恶双生子

trans-unit.resname: MM3·162 | Evil Twin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield, except it gains "{U}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature with the same name as this creature."
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场，但它获得「{U}{B}，{T}：消灭目标与此生物同名的生物。」

trans-unit.source: You can always tell the evil one by the dagger he's sticking in you.
trans-unit.target: 等到邪恶的那一个在你身上捅把刀，就能认出来了。

trans-unit.source: Falkenrath Aristocrat
trans-unit.target: 伐肯纳豪族

trans-unit.resname: MM3·163 | Falkenrath Aristocrat | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying, haste\nSacrifice a creature: CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn. If the sacrificed creature was a Human, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，敏捷 牺牲一个生物：CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。如果牺牲的生物是人类，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: "Your blood is quite pleasing. A pity there's not enough for both of us."
trans-unit.target: 「你的血相当令我满意。只可惜份量不够我俩共享。」

trans-unit.source: Fiery Justice
trans-unit.target: 火热正义

trans-unit.resname: MM3·164 | Fiery Justice | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 5 damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures and/or players. Target opponent gains 5 life.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意数量的目标生物和／或牌手造成共5点伤害，你可以任意分配。目标对手获得5点生命。

trans-unit.source: When the rebels couldn't breach the castle to kill Lalor the Obstinate, they tried a more internal approach to depose the pretender king.
trans-unit.target: 正当反抗军久攻不下，无法突破城堡防线时，他们转而尝试从内部下手来除掉冒牌国王妄王莱洛。

trans-unit.source: Ghor-Clan Rampager
trans-unit.target: 狂暴高尔族

trans-unit.resname: MM3·165 | Ghor-Clan Rampager | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nBloodrush — {R}{G}, Discard CARDNAME: Target attacking creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 血激～{R}{G}，弃掉CARDNAME：直到回合结束，目标进行攻击的生物得+4/+4且获得践踏异能。

trans-unit.source: "The Simic come from the cold slow depths. How could they understand the fire in a wild heart?"\n—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
trans-unit.target: 「析米克来自寒冷迟滞的深渊。他们如何能理解狂野心灵之火？」 ～古鲁祭师克许卡

trans-unit.source: Goblin Electromancer
trans-unit.target: 鬼怪电流术士

trans-unit.resname: MM3·166 | Goblin Electromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
trans-unit.target: 你施放的瞬间与法术咒语减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.source: When asked how much power is required, Izzet mages always answer "more."
trans-unit.target: 当被问到需要多强的力量时，伊捷的法师只会回答「更多」。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Germination
trans-unit.target: 葛加理式萌生

trans-unit.resname: MM3·167 | Golgari Germination | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个由你操控且非衍生物的生物死去时，派出一个1/1绿色腐生物衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: The Golgari don't bury their dead. They plant them.
trans-unit.target: 葛加理的成员从不埋葬亡者。那是拿来种的。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Rotwurm
trans-unit.target: 葛加理腐尸亚龙

trans-unit.resname: MM3·168 | Golgari Rotwurm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}, Sacrifice a creature: Target player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}，牺牲一个生物：目标牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Like corpse-worms through a carapace, rotwurms slide through the hollowed bones of the undercity.
trans-unit.target: 腐尸亚龙在地底城的空心骨架间穿梭，就像蛆虫穿过甲壳一样。

trans-unit.source: Ground Assault
trans-unit.target: 地面袭击

trans-unit.resname: MM3·169 | Ground Assault | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals damage to target creature equal to the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于由你操控的地之数量。

trans-unit.source: "Taking down a dragon is easy. All you need is enough space to get in a good swing."\n—Narbulg Nine Fingers
trans-unit.target: 「击倒龙很容易。你只需要有足够的空间来出手。」 ～九指纳博

trans-unit.resname: MM3·170 | Gruul War Chant | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Gruul War Chant
trans-unit.target: 古鲁战祷

trans-unit.resname: MM3·170 | Gruul War Chant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking creatures you control get +1/+0 and have menace.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控且进行攻击的生物得+1/+0且具有威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·170 | Gruul War Chant | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "We are the heart of the wild, the fire in its eyes, and the howl in its throat. Come, join the battle to which you were born."\n—Kroshkar, Gruul shaman
trans-unit.target: 「我们是荒野的心脏，它眼中的怒火，以及它喉头的怒吼。我们都是为了战争而生，一同上战场吧！」 ～古鲁祭师克许卡

trans-unit.source: Izzet Charm
trans-unit.target: 伊捷护符

trans-unit.resname: MM3·171 | Izzet Charm | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Choose one —
• Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
• CARDNAME deals 2 damage to target creature.
• Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •除非目标非生物咒语的操控者支付{2}，否则反击之。 •CARDNAME对目标生物造成2点伤害。 •抓两张牌，然后弃两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Kathari Bomber
trans-unit.target: 卡刹立轰击师

trans-unit.resname: MM3·172 | Kathari Bomber | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, create two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens and sacrifice CARDNAME.\nUnearth {3}{B}{R} ({3}{B}{R}: Return this card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step or if it would leave the battlefield. Unearth only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，派出两个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物并牺牲CARDNAME。 破坟{3}{B}{R}（{3}{B}{R}：将此牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。在下一个结束步骤开始时，或若它将离开战场，将它放逐。破坟的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Moroii
trans-unit.target: 莫洛伊

trans-unit.source: Flying\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 在你的维持开始时，你失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Touched by moroii"\n—Undercity slang meaning "to grow old"
trans-unit.target: 「给莫洛伊碰上」 ～地底城俚语，意指「变老」

trans-unit.source: Mystic Genesis
trans-unit.target: 神秘创生

trans-unit.resname: MM3·174 | Mystic Genesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. Create an X/X green Ooze creature token, where X is that spell's converted mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。派出一个X/X绿色流浆衍生生物，X为该咒语的总法术力费用。

trans-unit.source: "The Simic can grow anything out of a puddle of sludge. I just hope they never join forces with the Golgari."\n—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov
trans-unit.target: 「析米克能够在烂泥洼上种出任何东西。我只希望他们永远不会与葛加理连手。」 ～欧佐夫大特使泰莎卡洛夫

trans-unit.source: Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius
trans-unit.target: 龙智者尼米捷

trans-unit.resname: MM3·175 | Niv-Mizzet, Dracogenius | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals damage to a player, you may draw a card.\n{U}{R}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成伤害时，你可以抓一张牌。 {U}{R}：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: He has no patience for minds that do not inspire him or explode by trying.
trans-unit.target: 对那些无法激起他智识火花、或是因努力尝试而报废的脑袋，他可毫无耐性。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·176 | Obzedat, Ghost Council | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Obzedat, Ghost Council
trans-unit.target: 欧节达鬼影议会

trans-unit.resname: MM3·176 | Obzedat, Ghost Council | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, target opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.\nAt the beginning of your end step, you may exile Obzedat. If you do, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of your next upkeep. It gains haste.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，目标对手失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以放逐欧节达。若你如此作，在你的下一个维持开始时，将它在其拥有者之操控下移回战场。它获得敏捷异能。

trans-unit.source: Olivia Voldaren
trans-unit.target: 奥莉薇亚沃达连

trans-unit.resname: MM3·177 | Olivia Voldaren | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\n{1}{R}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to another target creature. That creature becomes a Vampire in addition to its other types. Put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.\n{3}{B}{B}: Gain control of target Vampire for as long as you control CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 {1}{R}：CARDNAME对另一个目标生物造成1点伤害。该生物额外具有吸血鬼此类别。在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 {3}{B}{B}：于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，获得目标吸血鬼的操控权。

trans-unit.source: Pilfered Plans
trans-unit.target: 遭窃计划

trans-unit.resname: MM3·178 | Pilfered Plans | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard. Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Mirko Vosk hunted anyone with knowledge of the maze, draining the chances of the other guilds.
trans-unit.target: 梅可沃斯猎杀所有知道迷宫奥秘的人，要让其他公会毫无胜算。

trans-unit.source: Putrefy
trans-unit.target: 腐烂

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或生物。它不能重生。

trans-unit.source: "We are all decaying, always in a state of near-death. One moment without breath and we begin to break down."\n—Cevraya, Golgari shaman
trans-unit.target: 「我们都在逐渐衰败，一直处于死亡边缘。只要有一刻停止呼吸，就开始支离破碎。」 ～葛加理祭师习拉雅

trans-unit.resname: MM3·180 | Rhox War Monk | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhox War Monk
trans-unit.target: 罗克战僧

trans-unit.resname: MM3·180 | Rhox War Monk | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Lifelink
trans-unit.target: 系命

trans-unit.resname: MM3·180 | Rhox War Monk | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Rhox monks are dedicated to spiritual growth and learning, and most bear the sigils of many students. However, they do not gladly suffer fools or those who disagree with their carefully wrought dogma.
trans-unit.target: 罗克修行僧致力于精神层面的成长与学习，通常都持有学生众多的印记。不过，他们不太能容忍愚人，或是对他们精心制订的戒律有意见者。

trans-unit.source: Sedraxis Specter

trans-unit.target: 波洛斯印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·217 | Boros Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{R}{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "Have you ever held a Boros signet? There's a weight to it that belies its size—a weight of strength and of pride."\n—Agrus Kos
trans-unit.target: 「你有没有用手捧过波洛斯印记？ 这印记比外表看起来要沉重许多～因为它承载了厚实的力量与荣耀。」 ～阿固寇斯

trans-unit.source: Damping Matrix
trans-unit.target: 滞阻间质

trans-unit.resname: MM3·218 | Damping Matrix | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Activated abilities of artifacts and creatures can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 除了法术力异能之外，神器与生物的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.source: The priests tried cursing it. The mages tried dispelling it. In the end, they all obeyed it.
trans-unit.target: 僧侣试着向它诅咒。法术师试着向它解咒；到头来，他们全部向它屈服。

trans-unit.source: Dimir Signet
trans-unit.target: 底密尔印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·219 | Dimir Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{U}{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: An emblem of a secret guild, the Dimir insignia is seen only by its own members—and the doomed.
trans-unit.target: 秘密存在的底密尔公会，其徽记没有外人见过～除了手底亡魂之外。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Signet
trans-unit.target: 葛加理印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·220 | Golgari Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{B}{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Depending on your point of view, the seal represents a proud guardian of the natural cycle or one who has sold her soul to darkness for eternal life.
trans-unit.target: 这徽记的意义随你观点不同而变化：可能是足以自傲的自然循环护卫，也可能是向黑暗出卖灵魂以求永生的恶徒。

trans-unit.source: Grafdigger's Cage
trans-unit.target: 挖坟人囚笼

trans-unit.resname: MM3·221 | Grafdigger's Cage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Creature cards can't enter the battlefield from graveyards or libraries.\nPlayers can't cast cards in graveyards or libraries.
trans-unit.target: 生物牌不能从坟墓场或牌库进战场。 牌手不能从坟墓场或牌库施放牌。

trans-unit.source: "If you wind up in one of mine, you can be sure as silver it will be your last."\n—Grafdigger Wulmer
trans-unit.target: 「如果你最终由我服务，你可以如同信任银一样确定这是你最后一次。」 ～挖坟人渥玛

trans-unit.source: Gruul Signet
trans-unit.target: 古鲁印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·222 | Gruul Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {R}{G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{R}{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Gruul territorial markings need not be legible. The blood, snot, and muck used to smear them are unmistakably Gruul.
trans-unit.target: 古鲁的地界标志不需要刻意清楚标示。看到用鲜血，鼻涕，或粪便涂抹的痕迹，就晓得这边属于古鲁。

trans-unit.source: Izzet Signet
trans-unit.target: 伊捷印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·223 | Izzet Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {U}{R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{U}{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Izzet signet is redesigned often, each time becoming closer to a vanity portrait of Niv-Mizzet.
trans-unit.target: 伊捷印记的设计经常变化，每次都更接近尼米捷浮华的画像。

trans-unit.source: Orzhov Signet
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·224 | Orzhov Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {W}{B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{W}{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The form of the sigil is just as important as the sigil itself. If it's carried on a medallion, its bearer is a master. If it's tattooed on the body, its bearer is a slave.
trans-unit.target: 此印记之类型与其本身一样重要。若出现在徽章上，配印者便是主人。若刺青在肉体上，背负者即是奴隶。

trans-unit.source: Rakdos Signet
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·225 | Rakdos Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {B}{R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{B}{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Made of bone and boiled in blood, a Rakdos signet is not considered finished until it has been used as a murder weapon.
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司印记以白骨制成，要拿鲜血煮过，并且用来杀生之后才能算是大功告成。

trans-unit.source: Selesnya Signet
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·226 | Selesnya Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{G}{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The symbol of the Conclave is one of unity, with tree supporting sun and sun feeding tree.
trans-unit.target: 盟会的印记象征天人合一；树木支持着太阳，太阳滋养着树木。

trans-unit.source: Simic Signet
trans-unit.target: 析米克印记

trans-unit.resname: MM3·227 | Simic Signet | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}: Add {G}{U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}：加{G}{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: For the Simic Combine, its sigil serves not as an emblem of honor but as a trademark. Its familiar image on any biological commodity attests to superb craftsmanship, ingenious innovation, and higher cost.
trans-unit.target: 对析米克联合而言，其印记并非荣誉之徽记，而是注册商标。这熟悉图像在任何生体用品上都可见到，证明了为其投资的高超技巧，精妙创意，以及昂贵费用。

trans-unit.source: Arcane Sanctum
trans-unit.target: 玄秘圣所

trans-unit.resname: MM3·228 | Arcane Sanctum | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}，{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "We must rely on our own knowledge, not on the dogma of the seekers or the mutterings of the sphinxes."\n—Tullus of Palandius
trans-unit.target: 「我们得依赖自己的知识，而不是致知者的文件、史芬斯的呢喃。」 ～帕连迪的突卢兹

trans-unit.source: Arid Mesa
trans-unit.target: 不毛高地

trans-unit.resname: MM3·229 | Arid Mesa | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a Mountain or Plains card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张山脉或平原牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Azorius Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·230 | Azorius Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Azorius symbol stares down like a great eye, reminding visitors of the watchful presence of Isperia and her lawmages.
trans-unit.target: 俄佐立的奇诡符号如巨眼般俯视一切，让访客随时感受着伊佩利与其律法师的重重监视。

trans-unit.source: Boros Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 波洛斯公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·231 | Boros Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: It promises protection to those in need and proclaims a warning to any who would threaten Ravnican law.
trans-unit.target: 它承诺会让弱者受到保护，立誓要让威胁拉尼卡律法者受到切实威吓，不敢轻举妄动。

trans-unit.resname: MM3·232 | Cavern of Souls | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cavern of Souls
trans-unit.target: 灵魂洞窟

trans-unit.resname: MM3·232 | Cavern of Souls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.\n{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell of the chosen type, and that spell can't be countered.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个生物类别。 {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。此法术力只能用来施放该类别的生物咒语，且该咒语不能被反击。

trans-unit.source: Crumbling Necropolis
trans-unit.target: 崩毁古陵寝

trans-unit.resname: MM3·233 | Crumbling Necropolis | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}，{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "They say the ruins of Sedraxis were once a shining capital in Vithia. Now it is a blight, a place to be avoided by the living."\n—Olcot, Rider of Joffik
trans-unit.target: 「据说塞卓基司曾是威西亚帝国的美丽首都。现在却是枯萎、生人勿近的地方。」 ～裘非骑兵团的傲克

trans-unit.source: Dimir Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 底密尔公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·234 | Dimir Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: In the cold corridors of the undercity, misinformation unfurls from Duskmantle like a spreading stain.
trans-unit.target: 伪造迷讯自暮篷始发，藉由地底城的寒冷走廊四处传播，有如污迹向外扩散。

trans-unit.source: Golgari Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 葛加理公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·235 | Golgari Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Every part of the gate was reclaimed from forgotten ruins and imbued with new purpose by the Swarm.
trans-unit.target: 门的每个部份都是从人迹罕至的破败遗迹解回，重新注入群落的使命。

trans-unit.source: Gruul Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 古鲁公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·236 | Gruul Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R} or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The scarred rubble around the gate is testament to past meetings of the Clans, summits that inevitably devolved into brawls.
trans-unit.target: 门旁的碎石见证着部族过往的集会～十有八九均会化作斗殴一场的领袖聚议。

trans-unit.source: Izzet Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 伊捷公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·237 | Izzet Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {U} or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Beyond lies the culmination of all Izzet projects, a grand experiment led by the dragon Niv-Mizzet himself.
trans-unit.target: 门后深宫内满是伊捷已臻至极致的所有计划，巨龙尼米捷尽其所能亲自领导的伟大试验初具雏形。

trans-unit.source: Jungle Shrine
trans-unit.target: 丛林祭祠

trans-unit.resname: MM3·238 | Jungle Shrine | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{R}，{G}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: On Naya, ambition and treachery are scarce, hunted nearly to extinction by the awe owed to terrestrial gods.
trans-unit.target: 野心与背叛在纳雅并不常见，早已被对现世神明的崇敬猎捕得近乎灭绝。

trans-unit.source: Marsh Flats
trans-unit.target: 沼地平野

trans-unit.resname: MM3·239 | Marsh Flats | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a Plains or Swamp card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张平原或沼泽牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Misty Rainforest
trans-unit.target: 雾漫雨林

trans-unit.resname: MM3·240 | Misty Rainforest | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a Forest or Island card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张树林或海岛牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Orzhov Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·241 | Orzhov Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {W} or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: "We do not believe in hiding our wealth in the shadows. This is Orzhov, and this is how we reward greatness."\n—Teysa Karlov, Grand Envoy of Orzhov
trans-unit.target: 「我们不会把财富秘藏在不见天日的地方。这就是欧佐夫。这就是我们的立足之本与彰显荣耀的方式。」 ～欧佐夫大特使泰莎卡洛夫

trans-unit.source: Rakdos Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 拉铎司公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·242 | Rakdos Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.
trans-unit.target: 告离拉铎司门口的迷宫奔越者，已将所有顾忌与大量皮肤化作脑后云烟。

trans-unit.source: Savage Lands
trans-unit.target: 蛮野大地

trans-unit.resname: MM3·243 | Savage Lands | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}，{R}或{G}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
trans-unit.target: 勇得这世界与其间居民一样残酷。各种野蛮搏斗在大地划下伤痕，大地则型塑这些蛮兽，构成无法控制的残暴循环。

trans-unit.source: Scalding Tarn
trans-unit.target: 沸腾山湖

trans-unit.resname: MM3·244 | Scalding Tarn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for an Island or Mountain card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张海岛或山脉牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Seaside Citadel
trans-unit.target: 海滨殿堂

trans-unit.resname: MM3·245 | Seaside Citadel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}，{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
trans-unit.target: 为了智慧，它建在高地来监看万物。为了荣誉，它建在高地以验证勇武。为了力量，它建在高地好斥退攻势。

trans-unit.source: Selesnya Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·246 | Selesnya Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {W} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{W}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: The Selesyna welcome all to help them heal the city's wounds. The price, however, is devotion to the guild and a selfless belief in Trostani.
trans-unit.target: 瑟雷尼亚盟会欢迎有志者一同协助疗愈此城的伤口。不过代价是向公会效忠，并且不藏私地信奉卓塔妮。

trans-unit.source: Shimmering Grotto
trans-unit.target: 闪烁石室

trans-unit.resname: MM3·247 | Shimmering Grotto | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.\n{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}到你的法术力池中。 {1}，{T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Untold riches await those who forsake the bustling world to search the secret, silent places.
trans-unit.target: 数不清的财富等待着抛弃繁华世界，寻找僻静之处的人。

trans-unit.source: Simic Guildgate
trans-unit.target: 析米克公会门

trans-unit.resname: MM3·248 | Simic Guildgate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {G} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{G}或{U}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Simic biomancers don't concern themselves with guarding a gate. Their ever-present creations are enough to ward off trespassers.
trans-unit.target: 析米克这些生体术士大约从不担心防卫问题。他们不断造出的成品就足以吓阻入侵者。

trans-unit.source: Verdant Catacombs
trans-unit.target: 新绿陵墓

trans-unit.resname: MM3·249 | Verdant Catacombs | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a Swamp or Forest card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：从你的牌库中搜寻一张沼泽或树林牌，并将之放进战场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。
